gtceu.grapplemod.repair: Repair recipe, keeps your upgrades. §lNEVER combine two grapples or you'll lose ALL your upgrades!§r
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.maxlen: Decreases §lMax Length§r by 20, down to 20. (Rope is Returned).
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.lv:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.125
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.mv:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1.14
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.25
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.hv:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1.28
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.375
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.ev:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1.42
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.5
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.iv:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1.56
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.625
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.luv:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1.7
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.75
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.zpm:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 1.84
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 0.875
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.motor.uv:
Enables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, automatically reeling you in.
§lMotorMaxSpeed§r set to 2
§lMotorAcceleration§r set to 1
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.motor:
Disables the §lMotor§r Upgrade, returning the original motor.
Only works if you use the same type of Motor as before.
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.smart_motor: Enables the §lSmart Motor§r Upgrade, requires a Motor to be installed.
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.smart_motor: Disables the §lSmart Motor§r Upgrade, can be removed with the Motor already uninstalled. Returns the Basic Electronic Circuit
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.sticky: Enables the §lSticky§r Upgrade, causing the hook to stick to any block the rope touches.
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.sticky: Disables the §lSticky§r Upgrade, returning the Sticky Resin
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.lv:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 0.625
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.mv:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 1.25
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.hv:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 1.875
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.ev:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 2.5
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.iv:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 3.125
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.luv:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 3.75
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.zpm:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 4.375
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.forcefield.uv:
Enables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, repelling you from nearby blocks while Grappling.
§lRepel Force§r set to 5
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.forcefield:
Disables the §lForce Field§r Upgrade, returning the original Field Generator.
Only works if you use the same type of Field Generator as before.
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.magnet.magneti:
Enables the §lMagnet§r Upgrade, causing the hook itself to attach to nearby blocks.
§lAttraction Radius§r set to 1.25

Enables the §lMagnet§r Upgrade, causing the hook itself to attach to nearby blocks.
§lAttraction Radius§r set to 2.5

Enables the §lMagnet§r Upgrade, causing the hook itself to attach to nearby blocks.
§lAttraction Radius§r set to 3.75

Enables the §lMagnet§r Upgrade, causing the hook itself to attach to nearby blocks.
§lAttraction Radius§r set to 5
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.magnet:
Disables the §lMagnet§r Upgrade, returning the original Magnetic Ingot.
Only works if you use the same type of Magnetic Ingot as before.
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.gravity.0.5:
Returns the Hook's §lGravity§r back to 100 (0.5 -> 1).
The empty bucket will be filled with the Helium you used
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.gravity.0:
Returns the Hook's §lGravity§r back to 100 (0 -> 1).
The Gravitation Engine Unit will be returned.
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.lv:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 2.25
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.mv:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 2.5
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.hv:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 2.75
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.ev:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 3
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.iv:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 3.25
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.luv:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 3.5
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.zpm:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 3.75
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.throwspeed.uv:
Increases the §lThrow Speed§r of the Hook, causing it to travel farther.
§lThrow Speed§r set to 4
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.throwspeed:
Resets the §lThrow Speed§r of the hook back to normal, returning the original Piston.
Only works if you use the same type of Piston as before.
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.doublehook: Adds a §lSecondary Hook§r to your Grappling Hook
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.doublehook: Removes the §lSecondary Hook§r from your Grappling Hook
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.vertical_throw: Increases the §lVertical Throwing Angle§r of the hook by 5°, up to 90°.
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.vertical_thr: Decreases the §lVertical Throwing Angle§r of the hook by 5°, down to 0°.
gtceu.grapplemod.upgrades.angle:
Increases the §lHorizontal Angle§r for throwing your §lDouble Hooks§r by 5°, up to 90°.
Only accessible with a §lDouble Hook§r installed.
gtceu.grapplemod.downgrades.angle:
Decreases the §lHorizontal Angle§r for throwing your §lDouble Hooks§r by 5°, down to 5°°.
Only accessible with a §lDouble Hook§r installed.
